structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: When the office of county surveyor is vacant, the county judge/executive shall order the county clerk to take charge of the books and papers of the office, and the clerk shall give certified copies of the records when demanded, and the requirements of KRS 64.012 have been satisfied.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 88, secs. 81 and 93, effective July 1, 1992. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 249, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 175, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4677.

metadata.note: Amendment of this section by 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 88, secs. 81 and 93 became effective July 1, 1992, in compliance with 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 324, sec. 30.
